snippet.title: Let's play Battlecruisers, Level 6 (Windows PC)
snippet.description:
BattlecruisersGame.com

Sneaky preview of some of the new weapons, in this demonstration playthrough of a battle against Craner, the UAC weapons smuggler.




What is BATTLECRUISERS?


Did you mean Battlecruisers the strange RTS game from New Zealand?

Build the ultimate war machine in Battlecruisers, an upcoming 2D realtime strategy game for Android, iOS and Windows. This anticipated indie title has a distinct Kiwi flavour, but despite its South Pacific origin, the game is actually pretty exciting. Some might even say it’s a fresh, simple yet challenging game. The entirely hand-drawn art gives a distinctive and gorgeous style, proving that fun games can be beautiful - and vice versa :)
In charge of your own Battle Cruiser: an immense floating fortress, you must decide what to build to defend against frigates, destroyers and bombers sent by your enemy - the opposing Battle Cruiser. Reinforce your defence with shields and boosters and enhance your production speed with extra builder drones. Use creative strategies to lure your enemy into a tactical trap. Out-maneuver your enemy with fighters, gunships and fast attack boats. Counter attack with a variety of awesomely destructive weapons, including death star satellites, nuclear rockets, long-range artillery, and the ever-expanding list of experimental ultra-weapons.
When the sea levels rose, the world divided. The people live on floating cities. They fight for ever receding pockets of precious land, mostly scorched barren by the ever soaring climate. They wage war with immense floating fortresses - the Battlecruisers. Sea levels are rising. 

Discover and unlock the mysterious ultra-weapons, capable of finishing the game in a single strike: The Archon battleship, the Ultralisk rapid fabrication facility, Kamikaze Signal and more.

Launch a fleet of bomber aircraft drones, decimating your enemy from the skies with a hail of napalm bombs.

Build long range destroyer ships to take out your opponent from afar with missile batteries.
Engage stealth technology so your opponent cannot see what you’re building, then surprise them with a nuke to the face!

Turtle up with shields and defence turrets, then use long range artillery to send your enemy to the bottom of the sea.

Battlecruisers is completely free to play on mobile devices, but you have the option to buy new units and buildings as they are released, or pay like $10 once and get all new units and buildings free forever. 

More than 30 unique buildings and units are available to unlock at launch, and hundreds more planned for eventual release, so there will always be new content to discover!

Discover your own strategies to overcome the progressively more difficult and cunning artificial intelligence that learns from its own mistakes.

Subscribe to our channel and please buy our game when it comes on in February!
